org.encryptor4j.factory

Class AbsKeyFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.encryptor4j.factory.AbsKeyFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AESKeyFactory, DESKeyFactory

    public abstract class AbsKeyFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements KeyFactory

    Abstract KeyFactory implementation for creating secure keys.

    Author:
    Martin
